#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;





int compare(string s1, string s2) {
  for(int i = 0; i < s1.size() && i < s2.size() ; i++) {
    if(s1[i] != s2[i]){       
      return i;
    }
  }
  return min(s1.size(),s2.size());
}



vector<string> input() {
  vector<string> initials;
  int N = 0;
  cin >> N;
  for(int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
    string init;
    cin >> init;
    //cout << init << endl;
    initials.push_back(init);
  }
  return initials;

}



int algo(vector<string> initials){ 
  vector<int> checkpt;
  sort(initials.begin(), initials.end());
  char old = '\0';
  /*  for(int i = 0; i < initials.size(); i++) {
    string str = initials[i];
    if(old != str[0]) {
      checkpt.push_back(i);
    }
    old = str[0];
  }
  */
  int max = 0;

  for(int i = 1; i < initials.size(); i++) {
    int val = compare(initials[i-1],initials[i]);
    if(val > max) {
      max = val;
    }
  }
  return max;
}



int main() {
  vector<string> initials = input();
  int val = algo(initials);
  cout << val << endl;

  return 0;
}
